Title: Ways of Seeing
Description:
We're not doing anything! We're not doing anything!

Hang on a minute...

You look like a pretty important $r... Want in on a secret?

Turns out there's magical art in these ruins. And we can see it!

<Scrumpy proudly sticks out his chest.>

I can show you how to see 'em too! Just... don't tell Noriko yet.
ObjectivesText: Uncover ancient images in Camp Antonidas.
RewardText:
Malygos and Sindragosa, huh? Never heard of 'em. Sounds like they were pretty in love though.

I wonder who put these here?
